name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Read Time - Speed Read Text with Laser Focus!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your reading efficiency with adjustable speed controls

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Speed read articles, blog posts, news, emails & just about any web-based text on a clutter & ad free window. It's like Youtube's playback speed button, but for text! 

Ways you can speed read:

1) Directly open the webpage on your current tab in a new window.
2) Highlight any text area on a webpage and right-click to choose the speed reading option.
3) Copy and paste any piece of text into our interface @ https://thereadtime.com/speed-reader/

To enhance readability for dyslexic users, we've also included a dyslexic-friendly font option, making the reading experience more accessible and enjoyable.

Accelerate Your Reading

Harness the power of Rapid Serial Visual Presentation (RSVP) to absorb information up to 3 times faster than traditional reading methods. TheReadTime empowers you to swiftly navigate through web content, dramatically increasing your information intake with minimal loss of comprehension.

Immerse in Clarity

Experience web content as it was meant to be enjoyed—free from clutter and distractions. TheReadTime strips away extraneous elements like popups, images, headers, footers, and even ads, presenting you with a clean, customizable interface that allows for focused, undisturbed reading at your own pace.

Versatility at Your Fingertips with Dual Reading Modes

Switch effortlessly between speed reading and leisurely perusal. Whether you're racing against the clock or savouring every word, TheReadTime adapts to your needs, providing the perfect balance between speed and comfort. Edit mode allows you to delete or change parts of any extracted web content, giving you full control over your reading material.

Tailor Your Reading Environment

Craft your ideal reading sanctuary with our customization options:

Visual Perfection: Choose from a curated selection of fonts and themes to create your perfect reading ambiance.

Speed Mastery: Fine-tune reading speed to a comfortable level by adjusting words per minute (WPM) and words displayed at once (chunk size).

Advanced Controls: Dive deep into granular settings to further optimize your reading experience.

Test Your Reading Speed

Take our free reading speed test to find out how fast you read. You can pick from two difficulty levels: high school or college. 


With TheReadTime, you're not just reading—you're orchestrating a personalized journey through digital content, precisely calibrated to your preferences and goals.
